p: Decoctions were prepared by adding one tea bag containing 1 g of plant to 1 L of room temperature (RT) distilled water and kept boiling for 30 min. The tea bags were removed and the decoctions were cooled at RT before storage at −80 °C until analysis. Characterization of the polyphenol contents and antioxidant activity of the decoctions are reported in our previous study [ 27].
